titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit distributions from individual retirement plans to be contributed to 529 plans without including the distribution in gross income.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit distributions from individual retirement plans to be contributed to 529 plans without including the distribution in gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income distributions from individual retirement accounts for the purpose of making contributions to a qualified tuition program.
